title.narrative: Nepal Enhancement of Community Development Programme

description.narrative: The ECD programme is a bilateral programme which NRCS has been implementing in partnership with British Red Cross from February to Decemen 2019. The programme covers three wards (3,4 and 5) of Mahankal Rural Municiaplity, Lalitpur district. The programme covers 3 major areas; Outcome 1: Livelihoods - Vulnerable communities have strengthened and improved food security and income through increased access to livelihood strategies, improved market linkages and financial services. Outcome 2: Health and WASH- Hygiene and well-being is improved through increased access to water, sanitation and health education. Outcome 3: NRCS capacity building- NRCS and its district and sub-chapter have increased programme management capacity.
